title: My interview on ‘Cyrus Says’
summary: When this invite came, I was so thrilled. It was another “I have arrived” (“aatha naa pass aayitten“) moment, I guess – because Cyrus is one of the OGs in terms of what we today call “content creation”. I had a lot of fun, and perhaps this is the closest to the real “me” that’s out there. A big thank-you to the universe for making this happen.
full_review:
When this invite came, I was so thrilled. It was another “I have arrived” (“aatha naa pass aayitten“) moment, I guess – because Cyrus is one of the OGs in terms of what we today call “content creation”. I had a lot of fun, and perhaps this is the closest to the real “me” that’s out there. A big thank-you to the universe for making this happen.
